attributes.action: Ban the resale of baby formula.
attributes.background: With panic buying due to Coronavirus the resale of baby formula on any selling sites  including Facebook, amazon and ebay should be banned. Families are struggling to buy formula and there are individuals selling it to make profit while families struggling.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302823
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303070

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
